name: Landward Research Ltd
goal: Landward Research Ltd is a global social survey, labour market intelligence, skills development and monitoring & evaluation consultancy, working to support sustainable development around the world. We survey populations – such as users of technologies – to map their characteristics and identify which social groups are excluded. We survey workforces to measure and strengthen the skills, competencies and capabilities of individuals, organisations, professions and communities.
interests: Business and Industry, Culture, Education and training, Environment, Research and innovation
